attributes.action: stop uk restaurants charging money for tap water
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having been charged 50p in a Swansea restaurant for a small glass of tap water.That equals their water supply being £12 a gallon,this is a rip off.I have spoken to the local trading standards dept in Swansea Council,and they advise me there is nothing wrong/illegal with this practice.
